div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1650 Delta, 1940 Burial: 375-350 B.C. Contents: 12 AZ Aegina: 3 st. Sinope: 1 dr. Aradus: 1 fr. Sidon: 3 half-shekels (as BMC pl. 18, 5-6) Unc. Syria: 1 half-shekel Unc.: 3 (incl. 1 partly-fused Athens ?) Disposition: V. Adda, Alexandreia Robinson, NC 1960, pp. 33-6, illus.
